verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w laid|strong="H3318"\w* waste, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* robber: \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w laid|strong="H3318"\w* siege \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*, \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* rod \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* strike \w the|strong="H4480"\w* cheek \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* judge \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w AND|strong="H1121"\w* THOU, BETHLEHEM Ephrata, art \w a|strong="H5414"\w* little \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* thousands \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda: \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thee \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* unto \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ruler \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w going|strong="H7725"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w beginning|strong="H5704"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* days \w of|strong="H1121"\w* eternity.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* give \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* wherein \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* travaileth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H1431"\w* forth: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* remnant \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brethren \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* converted \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* children \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Israel.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* strength \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* height \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w his|strong="H5921"\w* God: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* converted, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* magnified \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* man \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* peace, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrian \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w set|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w foot|strong="H1869"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* houses: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* raise \w against|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* seven \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* eight principal men.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* feed \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Assyria \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nemrod \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* spears thereof: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* deliver \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrian, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* tread \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* borders.

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* dew \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* drops \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* grass, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* waiteth \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H0369"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* tarrieth \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* children \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* remnant \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Gentiles \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3027"\w* many peoples \w as|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* forests, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* young lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flocks \w of|strong="H3027"\w* sheep: \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* go \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* tread \w down|strong="H3772"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H7311"\w*, \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* deliver.

Thy hand \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* thy enemies, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* thy enemies \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H3772"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* come \w to|strong="H0776"\w* pass \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* day, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* take \w away|strong="H3605"\w* thy horses \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* thy chariots.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy land, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* throw \w down|strong="H3772"\w* all thy strong holds, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* away \w sorceries|strong="H3785"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* divinations \w in|strong="H1961"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* thy \w graven|strong="H6456"\w* \w things|strong="H4639"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thy statues \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3772"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thou shalt \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* adore \w the|strong="H3772"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0842"\w* I will \w pluck|strong="H5428"\w* up thy groves out \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H7130"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H0842"\w* will crush thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* execute \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* indignation \w among|strong="H0854"\w* all \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H8085"\w* ear.
